citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10 am on
26-Feb-18.
Spoke with Mrs. Bontrager at the facility. Licensees are both out of town today, and she was unable to accompany
inspection. Mr. Bontrager will call to discuss optimal hours for inspection.
